review: The Chromecast is an exceptional concept, but it seems to fall flat in usefulness and reliability. The product only streams a few apps such as Netflix, Youtube, and Chrome, and these are great for a time, but I feel like there are other, cheaper ways to go to get the same services streamed to your television. I have had some issues with it working properly and connecting, sometimes taking 20 minutes and a system reset to take care of. When I plan to use it I find myself hoping that it will work and expecting it not to show up automatically.Aside from reliability and usefulness, I think that it is a great idea, but needs to be patched up and added to.
